name: Shortling Alliances
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

sections.label: Replace Heavy Throwing Weapon and Hand Weapon

options.label: Heavy Throwing Weapon (12", A1, AP(1)), Dagger (A2)

sections.label: Replace Throwing Weapon and Hand Weapon

spells.name: Nature's Guidance
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Indirect when shooting against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Piercing Vines
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with AP(2).

spells.name: Spirit Wind
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Rapid Charge once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Energy Spark
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 6", which take 2 hits each.

spells.name: Wild Fortification
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which get Tenacious Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Thorn Blast
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 12", which take 2 hits with AP(1) and Quake each.

specialRules.name: Stealth Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Stealth. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Quake
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and on unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Tenacious
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot or charged from over 9" away, they get +1 to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Tenacious Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Tenacious Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Swift Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Swift. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Devastating Frenzy
specialRules.description: Place one marker on this unit when it fully destroys an enemy unit. For each marker all models with this rule in this unit get AP(+1) and +1 to defense rolls until the end of the game (up to a max. of +2).

specialRules.name: Furious Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Furious. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Relentless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Relentless. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Indirect when Shooting Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Indirect when shooting. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Stealth
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot from over 9" away, enemy units get -1 to hit rolls.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Regeneration
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

specialRules.name: Ignores Regeneration
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores Regeneration.

specialRules.name: Tenacious Boost
specialRules.description: If all models in this unit have Tenacious, they always get +1 to defense rolls from Tenacious (instead of only when being shot/charged from over 9" away).

specialRules.name: Swift
specialRules.description: This model may ignore the Slow rule.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Furious
specialRules.description: When charging, unmodified results of 6 to hit in melee deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Indirect
specialRules.description: Gets -1 to hit rolls when shooting after moving. May target enemies that are not in line of sight as if in line of sight, and ignores cover from sight obstructions.

specialRules.name: Rapid Charge
specialRules.description: This model moves +4" when using Charge actions.
